xwikidoc.content:
ocr.tesseract=Tesseract ocr.tesseract.configuration=Configuration ocr.tesseract.application.label=Tesseract Importer ocr.tesseract.description=This application allows you to import documents from images or scanned PDFs into wiki pages using optical character recognition. ocr.tesseract.gotoAdmin=Go to the administration in order to manage the application parameters.
######################### ## Tesseract Import wizard #########################
ocr.tesseract.importForm.fileUploadLabel=File to import ocr.tesseract.importForm.fileUploadHint=This file should either be a PDF or an image. ocr.tesseract.importForm.fileLanguageLabel=File language ocr.tesseract.importForm.fileLanguageHint=Selecting the correct file language will ease the importation and improve the quality of the imported document. ocr.tesseract.importForm.submit=Submit ocr.tesseract.import.finished=File successfully imported. ocr.tesseract.import.error=An error happened during the conversion. Please check the logs for details. ocr.tesseract.import.error.concurrentImport=You cannot send two files for importation at the same time, please wait for the last import to finish.
ocr.tesseract.currentImportStatus=Current import status ocr.tesseract.importNewFile=Import a new file
## TesseractConfigurationClass OCR.Tesseract.Code.TesseractConfigurationClass_defaultLanguage=Default language OCR.Tesseract.Code.TesseractConfigurationClass_dataPath=Data path OCR.Tesseract.Code.TesseractConfigurationClass_allowAutoDownload=Allow auto download OCR.Tesseract.Code.TesseractConfigurationClass_trainingFilesURL=Training files URL OCR.Tesseract.Code.TesseractConfigurationClass_dataStoreUpdateInterval=Data store update interval
######################### ## Data store translations #########################
ocr.tesseract.store.status=Status
## Data Files ocr.tesseract.localDataFiles=Locally available data files ocr.tesseract.noLocalDataFiles=No local data files found. ocr.tesseract.remoteDataFiles=Remotely available data files ocr.tesseract.noRemoteDataFiles=No remote data files found.
## Store status and updates ocr.tesseract.store.noUpdateNeeded=The store is up to date! ocr.tesseract.store.updateNeeded=The store needs to be updated. ocr.tesseract.store.updateNow=Update now. ocr.tesseract.store.updateFinished=Update finished! ocr.tesseract.store.language=Language ocr.tesseract.store.localPath=Local path ocr.tesseract.store.actions=Actions ocr.tesseract.store.actions.remove=Remove ocr.tesseract.store.actions.download=Download
